item.description:
Hi Everyone,
Souled Out Show Band is playing at Whippersnappers, in Londonderry on Saturday Night! And boy do I need a night out!!!!!!!!!!! what a stressful week...and I can't think of any way to "detress" better than to boogie down.
here's their website, if you'd like to check them out, but this band has a lot of brass and a lot of "boogie power". http://www.sosb.ws/......
I don't think I'll be able to make dinner, in case anyone would like to coordinate that, please indicate in your reply, if you'd like to do eats, before "meet & greet", I should be there by about 8-8:30.
Usually Whips will take a reservation for dinner.
The band usually starts around 9:30, so I'll see you on the dance floor :)
susan
Talk about this Meetup

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Souled Out Show Band playing at WHIPS!
